keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: A Defense Department official said the Marine helicopter disappeared near Charikot village, which was hit hard by Tuesday’s magnitude 7.3 quake.

headline.main: U.S. Military Helicopter on Aid Mission in Nepal Is Missing

snippet: A Defense Department official said the Marine helicopter disappeared near Charikot village, which was hit hard by Tuesday’s magnitude 7.3 quake.
abstract: Military officials say United States Marine helicopter disappeared during earthquake relief mission to Nepalese village.
